name: Menacing Bane
descriptionText: You are deadly when you team up with allies against a single foe.
benefitText: You can use your bane class feature to imbue a melee weapon with the menacing special weapon ability (Advanced Player's Guide 288) instead of bane. You can spend a swift action to switch between the two special weapon abilities. Doing so otherwise works according to your bane class feature.
specialText: If you have the Double Bane feat, you can imbue each weapon you wield with either bane or menacing. No single weapon can have both.
